original_text: therefore you shall serve your enemies whom the Lord will send against you, in hunger and thirst, in nakedness, and lacking everything. And he will put a yoke of iron on your neck until he has destroyed you.
korean_text: 네가 주리고 목마르고 헐벗고 모든 것이 부족한 중에서 여호와께서 보내사 너를 치게 하실 적군을 섬기게 될 것이니 그가 철 멍에를 네 목에 메워 마침내 너를 멸할 것이라

sentences.original_text: therefore you shall serve your enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 네 원수들을 섬길 것이며

sentences.original_text: whom the Lord will send against you
And he will put a yoke of iron on your neck
